responseData.title: Adventure TV
responseData.shortDescription: Adrenaline & Adventure brings together documentaries of the most exciting, most pulse-pounding human adventures from around the world. These extreme sports and amazing adventures will leave you on the edge of your seat.
responseData.uniqueDescription: Adrenaline & Adventure brings together documentaries of the most exciting, most pulse-pounding human adventures from around the world. These extreme sports and amazing adventures will leave you on the edge of your seat.

episodeList.title: Jacques Cousteau's Legacy
episodeList.shortDescription: This film reconstructs the life of famed marine biologist and environmental pioneer Jacques Cousteau using a fascinating mix of wildlife footage, archive material and elaborate re-enactments.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: This film reconstructs the life of famed marine biologist and environmental pioneer Jacques Cousteau using a fascinating mix of wildlife footage, archive material and elaborate re-enactments.

episodeList.title: Java in Jeopardy
episodeList.shortDescription: In the past hundred years alone, it has claimed over 1,500 victims. The risk of another serious eruption is high and could possibly have global consequences. Now scientists are frantically searching for the key to the next tectonic disturbance.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: In the past hundred years alone, it has claimed over 1,500 victims. The risk of another serious eruption is high and could possibly have global consequences. Now scientists are frantically searching for the key to the next tectonic disturbance.

episodeList.title: Earthrace
episodeList.shortDescription: Earthrace tells the story of Pete Bethune and his crew’s attempt to break the world circumnavigation record aboard their biodiesel-fueled powerboat. Watch as these brave adventurers overcome the obstacles that are thrust in their path, and make history.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Earthrace tells the story of Pete Bethune and his crew’s attempt to break the world circumnavigation record aboard their biodiesel-fueled powerboat. Watch as these brave adventurers overcome the obstacles that are thrust in their path, and make history.

episodeList.title: To Be First
episodeList.shortDescription: Among the last unclimbed peaks on earth there stands a little-known mountain in a remote region of China. Follow a climbing expedition as they make three attempts over the span of three years to summit the 6060-meter Yangmolong Mountain..
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Among the last unclimbed peaks on earth there stands a little-known mountain in a remote region of China. Follow a climbing expedition as they make three attempts over the span of three years to summit the 6060-meter Yangmolong Mountain.

episodeList.title: Yukon Quest: Spirit of the North
episodeList.shortDescription: Through killing cold, over 1600 kilometers of subarctic winter wilderness, weary and sore... they run. During the Yukon Quest sled dog race, the far north of America tests each musher and dog to the limit.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Through killing cold, over 1600 kilometers of subarctic winter wilderness, weary and sore... they run. During the Yukon Quest sled dog race, the far north of America tests each musher and dog to the limit.

episodeList.title: Cannabiz
episodeList.shortDescription: Ganja. Dope. Weed. Pot. Whatever you call it, Canada’s $20 billion marijuana industry is now at a violent crossroads between commerce and crime.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Ganja. Dope. Weed. Pot. Whatever you call it, Canada’s $20 billion marijuana industry is now at a violent crossroads between commerce and crime. Impossible to police, yet steadily gaining public acceptance, the marijuana business is now so vast and vital to Canada’s national economy that it can no longer be ignored.

episodeList.title: Finding Traction
episodeList.shortDescription: Ultra Runner Nikki Kimball takes on the 273-mile Long Trail. What drives someone to attempt such an incredible feat? Follow Nikki's journey from its beginning to her actual record attempt through Vermont's beautiful but brutal Green Mountains.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Ultra Runner Nikki Kimball takes on the 273-mile Long Trail. What drives someone to attempt such an incredible feat? Follow Nikki's journey from its beginning to her actual record attempt through Vermont's beautiful but brutal Green Mountains.

seriesList.title: Off The Map
seriesList.shortDescription: What would you expect from a couple who met and fell in love at the North Pole? A French filmmaker and a Danish adventurer take us to the ends of the earth to discover some of the most remote, exotic and dangerous places on the planet.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: What would you expect from a couple who met and fell in love at the North Pole? French filmmaker Jean-Gabriel Leynaud and Danish adventurer Bettina Aller take us to the ends of the earth to discover some of the most remote, exotic and dangerous places on the planet. From the frozen ocean to lakes of lava, their fiery romance drives them to the limit – and beyond.

episodeList.title: 99 Days on the Ice
episodeList.shortDescription: Jean Gabriel and Bettina cross the Arctic Ocean on skis on the longest and most difficult polar expedition imaginable. The 2,000 kilometer trek pushes them to their physical and mental limits and exposes the dangers of global warming.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Jean Gabriel and Bettina cross the Arctic Ocean on skis on the longest and most difficult polar expedition imaginable. The 2,000 kilometer trek pushes them to their physical and mental limits and exposes the dangers of global warming.

episodeList.title: Path to the Stone Age
episodeList.shortDescription: Jean Gabriel and Bettina trek into the mountain forests of West Papua in search of the Korowai, an indigenous tribe living in near total isolation since the Stone Age. The couple plunges deep into the jungle to find a truly incredible people.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Jean Gabriel and Bettina trek into the mountain forests of West Papua in search of the Korowai, an indigenous tribe living in near total isolation since the Stone Age. The couple plunges deep into the jungle to find a truly incredible people.

episodeList.title: Inside the Volcano
episodeList.shortDescription: It's dangerous enough descending into an active volcano; it’s worse when that volcano is located in a war zone.  Bettina and Jean-Gabriel head to Rift Valley to conquer two mountains of fire and reach the shores of a 300-meter wide lava lake.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: It's dangerous enough descending into an active volcano; it’s worse when that volcano is located in a war zone.  Bettina and Jean-Gabriel head to Rift Valley to conquer two mountains of fire and reach the shores of a 300-meter wide lava lake.

seriesList.title: Ice Pilots
seriesList.shortDescription: This award-winning 13 part series follows the adventures of Buffalo Airways - an airline that flies WWII era propeller planes. The team faces drama in the sky and on the ground when the engineers and pilots attempt to cooperate and avoid a clash.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: This award-winning 13 part series follows the adventures of Buffalo Airways - an airline that flies WWII era propeller planes. The team faces drama in the sky and on the ground when the engineers and pilots attempt to cooperate and avoid a clash.

episodeList.title: Buffalo Air
episodeList.shortDescription: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing. Mikey gets in hot water when "Buffalo" Joe needs the backup Douglas DC-3 – and it's nowhere near ready.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing. Mikey gets in hot water when "Buffalo" Joe needs the backup Douglas DC-3 – and it's nowhere near ready. Episode 1.01 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Pre-Christmas Rush
episodeList.shortDescription: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalo's crucial food and mail runs come to a halt. Crusty mechanic Chuck must attempt a bare-handed engine swap in minus 30, and pressure pushes cargo manager Kelly to the breaking point.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalo's crucial food and mail runs come to a halt. Crusty mechanic Chuck must attempt a bare-handed engine swap in minus 30, and pressure pushes cargo manager Kelly to the breaking point. Episode 01.02 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Birthday From Hell
episodeList.shortDescription: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnie's 66th birthday run into the flight from hell – and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise. Ramp hand Jeremy is desperate to move up the ranks, but a female newbie could throw a wrench in his plans.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnie's 66th birthday run into the flight from hell – and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise. Ramp hand Jeremy is desperate to move up the ranks, but a female newbie could throw a wrench in his plans. Episode 1.03 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: A Big Deal
episodeList.shortDescription: When a power failure leaves Rankin Inlet exposed to the brutal northern elements, captain Justin races to deliver an emergency generator. Ramp hand Jeremy tries to move ahead of co-worker Audrey by training a new hire from India to replace him.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: When a power failure leaves Rankin Inlet exposed to the brutal northern elements, captain Justin races to deliver an emergency generator. Ramp hand Jeremy tries to move ahead of co-worker Audrey by training a new hire from India to replace him. Episode 1.04 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.shortDescription: It's up to engineer Adam to get the C-46 crew out of a jam on a remote airstrip in minus 40.  When Devan and Scott encounter the menace of wind shear at Bear Rock, it's a hair-raising experience that tests their friendship.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: It's up to engineer Adam to get the C-46 crew out of a jam on a remote airstrip in minus 40.  When Devan and Scott encounter the menace of wind shear at Bear Rock, it's a hair-raising experience that tests their friendship. Episode 1.05 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: On The Move
episodeList.shortDescription: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job. Devan ponders a job offer in Africa leaving his girlfriend to ponder their future.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job. Devan ponders a job offer in Africa leaving his girlfriend to ponder their future. Episode 1.06 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Suspension
episodeList.shortDescription: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years. It's also a setback for Jeremy and the other rampies, which takes a turn for the worse with an unexpected injury.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years. It's also a setback for Jeremy and the other rampies, which takes a turn for the worse with an unexpected injury. Episode 7 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Cause for Celebration
episodeList.shortDescription: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joe's birthday. A fuel leak, a sobering survival course, and a tragic crash rattle the Turkey crew.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joe's birthday. A fuel leak, a sobering survival course, and a tragic crash rattle the Turkey crew. Episode 1.08 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Transatlantic Crossing
episodeList.shortDescription: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back. Mikey and Scott search for a new rampie, while Jeremy's hopes plummet even further. Episode 1.09 of Ice Pilots.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back. Mikey and Scott search for a new rampie, while Jeremy's hopes plummet even further. Episode 1.09 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Thin Ice
episodeList.shortDescription: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake. On the final leg to Turkey, Arnie and Justin face some serious volcanoes and busy Mediterranean air traffic.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake. On the final leg to Turkey, Arnie and Justin face some serious volcanoes and busy Mediterranean air traffic. Episode 1.10 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: The Crash
episodeList.shortDescription: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey and everyone at Buffalo.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey and everyone at Buffalo. Episode 1.11 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Change of Seasons
episodeList.shortDescription: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo – or will she go? Jeremy has a chance to beat the other rampies to a job piloting the DC-3 – if he can pass the Joe test.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo – or will she go? Jeremy has a chance to beat the other rampies to a job piloting the DC-3 – if he can pass the Joe test. Episode 1.12 of Ice Pilots.

episodeList.title: Up In the Air
episodeList.shortDescription: After her husband's acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit. Jeremy makes a mistake that could end his Buffalo career. When the dust settles, someone will be leaving Buffalo Airways.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: After her husband's acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit. Jeremy makes a mistake that could end his Buffalo career. When the dust settles, someone will be leaving Buffalo Airways. Episode 1.13 of Ice Pilots.

seriesList.title: Around the Next Bend
seriesList.shortDescription: Two guys from Canada decide to sail down the Ganges River and explore India. Their journey teaches them about themselves as well as the world around them. 12 episodes.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: Two guys from Canada decide to sail down the Ganges River and explore India. Their journey teaches them about themselves as well as the world around them. 12 episodes.

episodeList.title: Delhi
episodeList.shortDescription: The Ganges River is considered one of the holiest rivers in the world. At 2510 km long draws from the Western Himalaya's in Northern India, flowing southeast to Bangladesh where it drains into the Indian Ocean. Episode 1 of "Around the Next Bend".
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The Ganges River is considered one of the holiest rivers in the world. At 2510 km long draws from the Western Himalaya's in Northern India, flowing southeast to Bangladesh where it drains into the Indian Ocean. Episode 1 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Yamuna
episodeList.shortDescription: The Yamuna is the largest tributary river of the Ganges in Northern India. Unfortunately the Yamuna is also one of the most polluted rivers in the world. Millions of people depend on the polluted Yamuna water. Episode 2 of "Around the Next Bend".
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The Yamuna is the largest tributary river of the Ganges in Northern India. Unfortunately the Yamuna is also one of the most polluted rivers in the world. Millions of people depend on the polluted Yamuna water. Episode 2 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Agra
episodeList.shortDescription: Vrindavan lies on the bank of the Yamuna river, 150 kilometers south of Delhi. The town was built upon the forest of Vrindavana, where Krishna spent his childhood. The town is a major pilgrimage destination for many traditions of Hinduism.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Vrindavan lies on the bank of the Yamuna river, 150 kilometers south of Delhi. The town was built upon the forest of Vrindavana, where Krishna spent his childhood. The town is a major pilgrimage destination for many traditions of Hinduism. Episode 3 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Holi
episodeList.shortDescription: The Taj Mahal lies on the bank of the Yamuna river in the city of Agra. While Agra is probably best known for the Taj and other historical buildings from the same era, it is also renown for its handy crafts, marble and stone inlay work and its sweets.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The Taj Mahal lies on the bank of the Yamuna river in the city of Agra. While Agra is probably best known for the Taj and other historical buildings from the same era, it is also renown for its handy crafts, marble and stone inlay work and its sweets. Episode 4 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Allahabad
episodeList.shortDescription: With over 1.18 billion people, India houses roughly one sixth of the world's population. Unfortunately, it's estimated that over 400 million Indians now live under the global poverty line of one dollar and twenty-five cents per day.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: With over 1.18 billion people, India houses roughly one sixth of the world's population. Unfortunately, it's estimated that over 400 million Indians now live under the global poverty line of one dollar and twenty-five cents per day. Episode 5 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Nepal
episodeList.shortDescription: For Hindus, there is no city holier than Varanasi, also known as Benares or Kashi, it is located on the banks of the Ganges in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh. Established over 3,000 years ago, it is one of the oldest cities in India.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: For Hindus, there is no city holier than Varanasi, also known as Benares or Kashi, it is located on the banks of the Ganges in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh. Established over 3,000 years ago, it is one of the oldest cities in India. Episode 7 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Varanasi
episodeList.shortDescription: In India the summer season begins in early March and lasts until late June. Much of Indian life during the summer is spent indoors and out of the sun. Daytime work is often abandoned between the hours of 10 a.m. and 4 p.m.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: In India the summer season begins in early March and lasts until late June. Much of Indian life during the summer is spent indoors and out of the sun. Daytime work is often abandoned between the hours of 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. Episode 6 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Monsoon
episodeList.shortDescription: The monsoon season typically arrives in June and lasts until September. The season is marked by an intense initial downpour that lasts for days, followed by a pattern of heavy rain for several hours each day.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The monsoon season typically arrives in June and lasts until September. The season is marked by an intense initial downpour that lasts for days, followed by a pattern of heavy rain for several hours each day. Episode 08 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Dhaka
episodeList.shortDescription: Considered to be the most densely populated country in the world, Bangladesh is situated on large, low-lying river deltas, flowing from the Himalayas into the Bay of Bengal.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Considered to be the most densely populated country in the world, Bangladesh is situated on large, low-lying river deltas, flowing from the Himalayas into the Bay of Bengal.

episodeList.title: Bangladesh
episodeList.shortDescription: Calcutta is considered the cultural capital of India and the birthplace of modern Indian literature and art. West Bengal shares much of its cultural heritage with the neighboring Bangladesh.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Calcutta is considered the cultural capital of India and the birthplace of modern Indian literature and art. West Bengal shares much of its cultural heritage with the neighboring Bangladesh. Episode 11 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Bihar
episodeList.shortDescription: With a population of over 100 million, Bihar is India's third most populous state. In ancient times, the area was considered the country's center of power, learning, and culture. Now, slow economic development has led it to becoming India's poorest state.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: With a population of over 100 million, Bihar is India's third most populous state. In ancient times, the area was considered the country's center of power, learning, and culture. Now, slow economic development has led it to becoming India's poorest state. Episode 9 of "Around the Next Bend".

episodeList.title: Farakka Barrage
episodeList.shortDescription: In traditional Indian culture, social status is defined by the caste system. It is a strict hierarchy that assigns social standing based on hereditary descendants. Under this system Indians are literally born into their social status.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: In traditional Indian culture, social status is defined by the caste system. It is a strict hierarchy that assigns social standing based on hereditary descendants. Under this system Indians are literally born into their social status. Episode 10 of "Around the Next Bend".

seriesList.title: Tornado Chasers
seriesList.shortDescription: The new chase season launches as Reed and the crew add a third Dominator to the fleet. Reed joins the KFOR weather team to bring unprecedented coverage of nature's fiercest storms to residents of Tornado Alley.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: The new chase season launches as Reed and the crew add a third Dominator to the fleet. Reed joins the KFOR weather team to bring unprecedented coverage of nature's fiercest storms to residents of Tornado Alley.

episodeList.title: Liftoff
episodeList.shortDescription: The new chase season launches as Reed and the crew add a third Dominator to the fleet. Reed joins the KFOR weather team to bring unprecedented coverage of nature's fiercest storms to residents of Tornado Alley.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The new chase season launches as Reed and the crew add a third Dominator to the fleet. Reed joins the KFOR weather team to bring unprecedented coverage of nature's fiercest storms to residents of Tornado Alley.

episodeList.title: Legends
episodeList.shortDescription: Jim Cantore, famed meteorologist and Reed's hero, arrives in Norman to chase in the Doms. With severe weather in the forecast, Reed connects with his team members, including a wavering Joel Taylor.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Jim Cantore, famed meteorologist and Reed's hero, arrives in Norman to chase in the Doms. With severe weather in the forecast, Reed connects with his team members, including a wavering Joel Taylor.

episodeList.title: Helix
episodeList.shortDescription: The chase season roars to life as two Kickstarter backers, Ray and Bill, join the TVN team. Reed and his crew observe a rare and dramatic tornado, along with the destruction it leaves behind.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The chase season roars to life as two Kickstarter backers, Ray and Bill, join the TVN team. Reed and his crew observe a rare and dramatic tornado, along with the destruction it leaves behind.

episodeList.title: Payback
episodeList.shortDescription: After Reed's success the day before, Dick abandons the TVN team and goes rogue. With an outbreak brewing in Kansas, Reed makes a risky move to chase in Oklahoma.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: After Reed's success the day before, Dick abandons the TVN team and goes rogue. With an outbreak brewing in Kansas, Reed makes a risky move to chase in Oklahoma.

episodeList.title: Warning: Part 1
episodeList.shortDescription: With twisters targeting the OKC metro area, Jim Cantore joins forces with Reed to provide real-time warnings. A breakneck chase through the populated city of Edmond leads to the team's first intercept in Dominator 3.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: With twisters targeting the OKC metro area, Jim Cantore joins forces with Reed to provide real-time warnings. A breakneck chase through the populated city of Edmond leads to the team's first intercept in Dominator 3.

episodeList.title: Warning: Part 2
episodeList.shortDescription: The unrelenting chase continues as Reed, Jim Cantore, and the team intercept another tornado before it grows into a mile-wide wedge. Coming upon storm damage, they perform search and rescue as a new tornado forms near Shawnee, OK.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The unrelenting chase continues as Reed, Jim Cantore, and the team intercept another tornado before it grows into a mile-wide wedge. Coming upon storm damage, they perform search and rescue as a new tornado forms near Shawnee, OK.

episodeList.title: Home: Part 1
episodeList.shortDescription: Reed's tornado intercepts gain national attention as the TVN team gears up for a stronger round of severe weather. Ginger Zee joins Reed and Jim Cantore for a chase day that threatens the city of Moore, OK.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Reed's tornado intercepts gain national attention as the TVN team gears up for a stronger round of severe weather. Ginger Zee joins Reed and Jim Cantore for a chase day that threatens the city of Moore, OK.

episodeList.title: Home: Part 2
episodeList.shortDescription: A devastating tornado tracks through Moore, OK, very close to Reed's house. Reed and the team, along with Jim Cantore and Ginger Zee, must decide whether to continue chasing or return to Moore.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: A devastating tornado tracks through Moore, OK, very close to Reed's house. Reed and the team, along with Jim Cantore and Ginger Zee, must decide whether to continue chasing or return to Moore.

episodeList.title: Stranded
episodeList.shortDescription: Reed and the team journey north to Kansas and come face-to-face with a mile-wide wedge. The storm turns the roads to mud and traps the Dominator in the tornado's path.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Reed and the team journey north to Kansas and come face-to-face with a mile-wide wedge. The storm turns the roads to mud and traps the Dominator in the tornado's path.

episodeList.title: Overtaken
episodeList.shortDescription: With 'Dominator 2' in rough shape from the previous day's intercept, a new tornado threat looms over Bennington, KS. Reed pushes his science mission to the limit as a massive wedge engulfs him and his team.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: With 'Dominator 2' in rough shape from the previous day's intercept, a new tornado threat looms over Bennington, KS. Reed pushes his science mission to the limit as a massive wedge engulfs him and his team.

episodeList.title: Nemesis: Part 1
episodeList.shortDescription: A potentially catastrophic tornado day threatens central Oklahoma. Upon reaching El Reno, Reed and the team witness the birth of a violent wedge tornado.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: A potentially catastrophic tornado day threatens central Oklahoma. Upon reaching El Reno, Reed and the team witness the birth of a violent wedge tornado.

episodeList.title: Nemesis: Part 2
episodeList.shortDescription: Reed's team pursues the El Reno wedge as it grows into the widest tornado in history. After the Dominator's hood gets ripped off, Reed helps Mike Bettes whose Weather Channel vehicle was crushed by the tornado.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Reed's team pursues the El Reno wedge as it grows into the widest tornado in history. After the Dominator's hood gets ripped off, Reed helps Mike Bettes whose Weather Channel vehicle was crushed by the tornado.

seriesList.title: The North Face Expeditions
seriesList.shortDescription: A multi-part part series inspired by teams of adventurers who span the globe, encountering exotic cultures and engaging in philanthropic missions.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: A multi-part part series inspired by teams of adventurers who span the globe, encountering exotic cultures and engaging in philanthropic missions.

episodeList.title: Light of the Himalaya
episodeList.shortDescription: This climb is more than just an adventure; it is a way to give back to the people of Nepal for sharing their mountain, which is held so sacred.  At “eye camps”, doctors perform sight-restoring surgeries before the 22,000 ft. peak is reached.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: This climb is more than just an adventure; it is a way to give back to the people of Nepal for sharing their mountain, which is held so sacred.  At “eye camps”, doctors perform sight-restoring surgeries before the 22,000 ft. peak is reached.

episodeList.title: Between Heaven and Earth
episodeList.shortDescription: In the heart of Siberian Russia, a young boy fighting leukemia inspires a team of kayakers to push on through one of the most dangerous rivers in the world, the Onot.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: In the heart of Siberian Russia, a young boy fighting leukemia inspires a team of kayakers to push on through one of the most dangerous rivers in the world, the Onot.

episodeList.title: Legends of the Lost World
episodeList.shortDescription: According to Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, dinosaurs exist on the plateus of Amazonian Tepui's.  Although "The Lost World" is a work of fiction, the spirit of adventure to the summit is very real, inspirational, and dangerous.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: According to Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, dinosaurs exist on the plateus of Amazonian Tepui's.  Although "The Lost World" is a work of fiction, the spirit of adventure to the summit is very real, inspirational, and dangerous.

episodeList.title: Shelter From The Storm
episodeList.shortDescription: Four woman adventurers embark on an epic journey to scale mountainsides and kiteski on frozen Baffin Island. While there, they’ll give back to the Inuit women of a nearby village, and inspire others to believe that the impossible is achievable.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Four woman adventurers embark on an epic journey to scale mountainsides and kiteski on frozen Baffin Island. While there, they’ll give back to the Inuit women of a nearby village, and inspire others to believe that the impossible is achievable.

seriesList.title: To the Ends of the Earth
seriesList.shortDescription: This series brings together documentaries of the most exciting, most pulse-pounding human adventures from around the world. These shows will leave you on the edge of your seat!
seriesList.uniqueDescription: This series brings together documentaries of the most exciting, most pulse-pounding human adventures from around the world. These shows will leave you on the edge of your seat!

episodeList.title: Hell on Ice
episodeList.shortDescription: Despite numerous attempts, the Antarctic Peninsula had never been crossed unassisted. Share the frustration, exhaustion, and calamity of two men who tackle one of the world’s most extreme and unpredictable regions.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Despite numerous attempts, the Antarctic Peninsula had never been crossed unassisted. Share the frustration, exhaustion, and calamity of two men who tackle one of the world’s most extreme and unpredictable regions.

episodeList.title: Hope on the Andaman Coast
episodeList.shortDescription: Cliff divers Joey Zuber, Orlando Duque, and Sergey Zotin explore the post-tsunami diving on Thailand's Andaman Coast.  While on their excursion, they help to build a more suitable school for the children living there.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Cliff divers Joey Zuber, Orlando Duque, and Sergey Zotin explore the post-tsunami diving on Thailand's Andaman Coast.  While on their excursion, they help to build a more suitable school for the children living there.

episodeList.title: Last Roar of the Tiger
episodeList.shortDescription: In the struggle to survive the wild, a professional tiger hunter is paid by the authorities to track down tigers showing abnormal behavior. As the characters and issues evolve, we take a look at the conflicting interests that affect the tiger's future.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: In the struggle to survive the wild, a professional tiger hunter is paid by the authorities to track down tigers showing abnormal behavior. As the characters and issues evolve, we take a look at the conflicting interests that affect the tiger's future.

episodeList.title: Mad Way South: The Sahara Challenge
episodeList.shortDescription: No one has attempted to cross the Sahara desert by wind power. Few would be crazy enough to believe that it could be achieved. Follow four adventure junkies as they race their kite buggies across 2200 kilometers of the Sahara desert.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: No one has attempted to cross the Sahara desert by wind power. Few would be crazy enough to believe that it could be achieved. Follow four adventure junkies as they race their kite buggies across 2200 kilometers of the Sahara desert.

episodeList.title: Madagascar Maverick
episodeList.shortDescription: Maverick adventurer Riaan Manser faces his biggest challenge yet: circumnavigating the world’s fourth largest island, Madagascar, home to pirates and rough seas, armed with only a kayak.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Maverick adventurer Riaan Manser faces his biggest challenge yet: circumnavigating the world’s fourth largest island, Madagascar, home to pirates and rough seas, armed with only a kayak.

episodeList.title: Mountains and Man: In Pursuit of Fear
episodeList.shortDescription: Mountains are places of extremes: extreme climates, extreme landscapes, and extreme danger. And yet, there are people who seek out that danger. What is it that draws thrill seekers to these majestic peaks, even at the risk of their lives?

episodeList.title: Morocco La Bas

episodeList.shortDescription: After a near-death mountain climbing accident, Joe Simpson’s injuries were so sever he was told he’d never climb again. His recovery left him to confront the question: why, after coming so close to death, did he feel compelled to continue climbing?

seriesList.title: The New Explorers

episodeList.shortDescription: Join Axel Ferrault as he travels the world to meet the people who live in the shadow of volcanoes. His first adventure takes us to Java, where he witnesses the horror that volcanoes can cause, as well as the natural majesty they evoke.

seriesList.title: Risk Takers
seriesList.shortDescription: Go behind the scenes of the most dangerous professions in the world, and experience all the gritty moments these risk takers endure every day.

episodeList.title: Urban Firefighters
episodeList.shortDescription: Everywhere, people do risky jobs. In Phoenix, Arizona, firefighters take 24 hour shifts—sometimes taking over 10 calls a day—to protect their communities. But for these men and women, the rush of the risk and helping those in need makes it all worth it.

episodeList.shortDescription: Join in the adventures of Benny and Kenny: premiere bat control specialists and the zaniest characters you will ever bump into in your attic. Come along as they use their construction savvy to save the day for homeowners who are being driven batty.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Join in the adventures of Benny and Kenny: premiere bat control specialists and the zaniest characters you will ever bump into in your attic. Come along as they use their construction savvy to save the day for homeowners who are being driven batty.

episodeList.title: Kick Fighters
episodeList.shortDescription: The K1World Max Championship determines the global master of K1, a fighting style that fuses Western boxing and Eastern martial arts. Follow three tournament favorites as they prepare for their greatest challenge, and see who becomes the world champion.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The K1World Max Championship determines the global master of K1, a fighting style that fuses Western boxing and Eastern martial arts. Follow three tournament favorites as they prepare for their greatest challenge, and see who becomes the world champion.

episodeList.title: Kung Fu Killers
episodeList.shortDescription: This countdown reveals the ten deadliest Kung Fu weapons of all time, uncovering the dark secrets of their creation and leading up to the unbelievable story of the ultimate Chinese killing machine.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: This countdown reveals the ten deadliest Kung Fu weapons of all time, uncovering the dark secrets of their creation and leading up to the unbelievable story of the ultimate Chinese killing machine.

episodeList.title: Kung Fu Monk
episodeList.shortDescription: Shaolin warrior monk Shi Yan Ming is a Chinese national treasure. But fate has taken him far from his home—to Manhattan, where he runs his own temple. This is the story of how one man is transforming an ancient Eastern tradition into a Western sensation.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Shaolin warrior monk Shi Yan Ming is a Chinese national treasure. But fate has taken him far from his home—to Manhattan, where he runs his own temple. This is the story of how one man is transforming an ancient Eastern tradition into a Western sensation.

episodeList.title: Monster Truck Tech
episodeList.shortDescription: Think an SUV is tough? A monster truck can withstand an impact with 20 times more force. And no one knows that better than the teams of mechanics and engineers that create and build these mechanical marvels.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Think an SUV is tough? A monster truck can withstand an impact with 20 times more force. And no one knows that better than the teams of mechanics and engineers that create and build these mechanical marvels.

episodeList.title: Pirate Patrols
episodeList.shortDescription: Go behind the scenes of Malaysia’s various waterborne prevention teams and follows their efforts to combat piracy in the Strait of Malacca, the world’s busiest waterway.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Go behind the scenes of Malaysia’s various waterborne prevention teams and follows their efforts to combat piracy in the Strait of Malacca, the world’s busiest waterway.

episodeList.title: The Art and Science of Freeflight
episodeList.shortDescription: Most people have had the "flying dream", imagining soaring high above the clouds or skimming the surface of the ocean.  Technology today has allowed hobbyists to take hold of their own wings in the recreational sport of freeflight.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Most people have had the "flying dream", imagining soaring high above the clouds or skimming the surface of the ocean.  Technology today has allowed hobbyists to take hold of their own wings in the recreational sport of freeflight.

episodeList.title: Secrets of the World's Greatest Escape Artists
episodeList.shortDescription: To an escape artist, there is nothing more thrilling than facing certain doom and getting away. The clock is ticking as these fearless performers fight to free themselves before they drown, suffocate, or collide with the earth at terminal velocity!
episodeList.uniqueDescription: To an escape artist, there is nothing more thrilling than facing certain doom and getting away. The clock is ticking as these fearless performers fight to free themselves before they drown, suffocate, or collide with the earth at terminal velocity!

episodeList.title: Stuntmen of Bollywood
episodeList.shortDescription: India’s Bollywood film industry lacks the high-tech gadgetry of Hollywood, and instead relies on the real-life wizardry of the country’s best stuntmen. Famous film star-stuntman Akshay Kumar hosts an exposé into this world of breathtaking stunts.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: India’s Bollywood film industry lacks the high-tech gadgetry of Hollywood, and instead relies on the real-life wizardry of the country’s best stuntmen. Famous film star-stuntman Akshay Kumar hosts an exposé into this world of breathtaking stunts.

seriesList.title: Dreamwrecks
seriesList.shortDescription: Join Cathy Salisbury and Dominique Serafini as they explore the underwater wrecks of the world. Using digital photography, video cameras, and an underwater sketchpad, the team is building an archive of structures destined to vanish forever.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: Join Cathy Salisbury and Dominique Serafini as they explore the underwater wrecks of the world. Using digital photography, video cameras, and an underwater sketchpad, the team is building an archive of structures destined to vanish forever. Having once worked with the famous Jacques Cousteau, Dominique serves as a fantastic guide for the team, leading them to some truly fantastic destinations.

episodeList.title: Hollywood Ruins
episodeList.shortDescription: Far from the bright lights of Hollywood lies an underwater back lot, an ocean studio where moviemakers find the world’s most fantastic wrecks.  See the filming locations of some classic movies, including James Bond, Jaws, and Into the Blue.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Far from the bright lights of Hollywood lies an underwater back lot, an ocean studio where moviemakers find the world’s most fantastic wrecks.  See the filming locations of some classic movies, including James Bond, Jaws, and Into the Blue.

episodeList.title: Bermuda Blues
episodeList.shortDescription: Bermuda is a gorgeous getaway, but it is not without its tragedies.  Many ships have fallen captive to shallow waters and hidden shoals.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Bermuda is a gorgeous getaway, but it is not without its tragedies.  Many ships have fallen captive to shallow waters and hidden shoals.

episodeList.title: Titanic of the Caribbean
episodeList.shortDescription: Known as the Titanic of the Caribbean, the “Bianca C” sank to the bottom of the sea after a mysterious explosion caused a widespread fire.  Uncovering this secret will be a dangerous task.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Known as the Titanic of the Caribbean, the “Bianca C” sank to the bottom of the sea after a mysterious explosion caused a widespread fire.  Uncovering this secret will be a dangerous task.

episodeList.title: Sunk by a Volcano
episodeList.shortDescription: The eruption of Mount Pelee in the Caribbean killed over 28,000 people, dubbed the worst volcanic disaster of the 20th century.  Follow the team as they survey the once-leveled area.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The eruption of Mount Pelee in the Caribbean killed over 28,000 people, dubbed the worst volcanic disaster of the 20th century.  Follow the team as they survey the once-leveled area.

episodeList.title: Grenada Storms
episodeList.shortDescription: Here in the Caribbean, tropical storms are a way of life.  The devastating force of a potential hurricane lies in the warm sea air.  See the destruction of hurricanes Ivan and Emily, occurring less than a year apart  on the small island.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Here in the Caribbean, tropical storms are a way of life.  The devastating force of a potential hurricane lies in the warm sea air.  See the destruction of hurricanes Ivan and Emily, occurring less than a year apart  on the small island.

episodeList.title: The Nahoon
episodeList.shortDescription: Join the team as they explore this ancient and pristine party boat, as well as search for lost and elusive cannons, camouflaged in living coral.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Join the team as they explore this ancient and pristine party boat, as well as search for lost and elusive cannons, camouflaged in living coral.

episodeList.title: Sunken Drugrunner
episodeList.shortDescription: Thanks to its preserved reefs and sea life, and beautiful shipwrecks, Bonaire considered one of the top 5 diving destinations in the world.  Check out a sunken smuggling boat before it gets "busted".
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Thanks to its preserved reefs and sea life, and beautiful shipwrecks, Bonaire considered one of the top 5 diving destinations in the world.  Check out a sunken smuggling boat before it gets "busted".

episodeList.title: Tugboat Twins
episodeList.shortDescription: While Curacao's aquarium has been a great success, the shipwrecks they are trying to add as a diving attraction keep disappearing... The team gets the help of some domesticated dolphins to find them!
episodeList.uniqueDescription: While Curacao's aquarium has been a great success, the shipwrecks they are trying to add as a diving attraction keep disappearing... The team gets the help of some domesticated dolphins to find them!

episodeList.title: Bonaire Adventure
episodeList.shortDescription: Dominique shows us more about what painting means to him, and tries to take us to his favorite and most memorable Dreamwreck.  Unfortunately, a visit from local authorities may dash his plans.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Dominique shows us more about what painting means to him, and tries to take us to his favorite and most memorable Dreamwreck.  Unfortunately, a visit from local authorities may dash his plans.

episodeList.title: Wrecks of World War II
episodeList.shortDescription: The Caribbean Sea off the coast of Aruba was once the setting for a dramatic scene that played out during the Second World War.  One mysterious relic still stands, evidence of a secret mission that threatened to turn the course of history.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The Caribbean Sea off the coast of Aruba was once the setting for a dramatic scene that played out during the Second World War.  One mysterious relic still stands, evidence of a secret mission that threatened to turn the course of history.

episodeList.title: Escaped Prisoners
episodeList.shortDescription: While on St. Thomas in the Virgin Islands, the team gets an extraordinary opportunity.  While they slept peacefully, a small plane carrying 4 juvenile detainees crash-landed in the ocean nearby.  Time for a change of plan.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: While on St. Thomas in the Virgin Islands, the team gets an extraordinary opportunity.  While they slept peacefully, a small plane carrying 4 juvenile detainees crash-landed in the ocean nearby.  Time for a change of plan.

episodeList.title: Fight or Flight
episodeList.shortDescription: Back in the Caribbean, the team dives two unique wrecks.  One is a beautifully preserved freighter with a shady secret, the other an intact plane that will soon fall prey to the might of the ocean.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Back in the Caribbean, the team dives two unique wrecks.  One is a beautifully preserved freighter with a shady secret, the other an intact plane that will soon fall prey to the might of the ocean.

episodeList.title: How to Sink a Ship
episodeList.shortDescription: The team is revisiting a ship sunk intentionally years ago.  What took a great deal of manpower to accomplish can be accomplished by the mighty ocean in a mere few minutes.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The team is revisiting a ship sunk intentionally years ago.  What took a great deal of manpower to accomplish can be accomplished by the mighty ocean in a mere few minutes.

episodeList.title: Recycled Wreckage
episodeList.shortDescription: Off the coast of Curacao, and natural recycling program is taking hold.  Old machinery, abandoned cars, and a one-time Christmas cargo carrier become one at the bottom of the sea.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Off the coast of Curacao, and natural recycling program is taking hold.  Old machinery, abandoned cars, and a one-time Christmas cargo carrier become one at the bottom of the sea.

episodeList.title: Historic Behemoth
episodeList.shortDescription: This immense dreamwreck carried tanks in WWII.  After its decommission, it was converted into a freighter for commercial goods.  Now the only thing its cargo holds carry is water, as well as a variety of sea life.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: This immense dreamwreck carried tanks in WWII.  After its decommission, it was converted into a freighter for commercial goods.  Now the only thing its cargo holds carry is water, as well as a variety of sea life.

episodeList.title: Anegada Da Vita
episodeList.shortDescription: The island of Anegada is home to the most treacherous navigational hazard of the Caribbean sea.  The surrounding Horseshoe Reef can be perilous to passing ships.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The island of Anegada is home to the most treacherous navigational hazard of the Caribbean sea.  The surrounding Horseshoe Reef can be perilous to passing ships.

episodeList.title: Earthquakes and Hurricane
episodeList.shortDescription: Often, natural disasters create only chaos and destruction.  Here in Roatan Honduras, hurricanes and earthquakes have sculpted some of the world's most unique diving destinations.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Often, natural disasters create only chaos and destruction.  Here in Roatan Honduras, hurricanes and earthquakes have sculpted some of the world's most unique diving destinations.

episodeList.title: Sinking an Aircraft Carrier
episodeList.shortDescription: One of the largest warships ever built is playing out its final days in the Gulf of Mexico.  The Dreamwrecks team is chasing the story of this colossal vessel all the way to the bottom.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: One of the largest warships ever built is playing out its final days in the Gulf of Mexico.  The Dreamwrecks team is chasing the story of this colossal vessel all the way to the bottom.

episodeList.title: Mangrove Maze
episodeList.shortDescription: The island of Roatan is home to mystical mangroves, magnificent marine life, and the clearest waters the ocean has to offer.  But even here, the sea is an unpredictable force.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The island of Roatan is home to mystical mangroves, magnificent marine life, and the clearest waters the ocean has to offer.  But even here, the sea is an unpredictable force.

episodeList.title: Dolphin's Den
episodeList.shortDescription: After thousands of years, the caverns that cut through the Caribbean’s largest reef now lead to the region’s most spectacular dive site.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: After thousands of years, the caverns that cut through the Caribbean’s largest reef now lead to the region’s most spectacular dive site.

episodeList.title: Wreck Alley
episodeList.shortDescription: A unique experience to discover 3 dreamwrecks side by side, all on one tank of air!  Also, see a sunken fishing boat turned underwater oasis by time and coral growth.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: A unique experience to discover 3 dreamwrecks side by side, all on one tank of air!  Also, see a sunken fishing boat turned underwater oasis by time and coral growth.

episodeList.title: Luxury Liner
episodeList.shortDescription: Off the coast of the British Virgin Islands, one dive site stands out above all the rest.  The RMS Rhone is a 100-year-old luxury liner that fell victim to one of the great ocean disasters of history.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Off the coast of the British Virgin Islands, one dive site stands out above all the rest.  The RMS Rhone is a 100-year-old luxury liner that fell victim to one of the great ocean disasters of history.

episodeList.title: Fish Haven
episodeList.shortDescription: Off the coast of Florida, a ghost ship provides a home for thousands of fish, but this undersea haven is also a trap.  Now the bait has been set for an ancient form of fishing that attracts some hungry competition.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Off the coast of Florida, a ghost ship provides a home for thousands of fish, but this undersea haven is also a trap.  Now the bait has been set for an ancient form of fishing that attracts some hungry competition.

episodeList.title: Dangerous Depths
episodeList.shortDescription: It will take some high-tech tools and precision planning to reach down to this former freighter.  This is one of the most risky dives the team has done to date.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: It will take some high-tech tools and precision planning to reach down to this former freighter.  This is one of the most risky dives the team has done to date.

episodeList.title: Versatility Undersea
episodeList.shortDescription: Off the coast of the Cayman Islands, the dreamwrecks team is discovering there's more than one way to explore the sea as they free dive, night dive, and wall dive the Caribbean's most mysterious sites.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Off the coast of the Cayman Islands, the dreamwrecks team is discovering there's more than one way to explore the sea as they free dive, night dive, and wall dive the Caribbean's most mysterious sites.

episodeList.title: Weapon of War
episodeList.shortDescription: Few witness the sinking of a ship and live to tell the tale, but after 10 years under the sea, a former weapon of war is now waiting to be rediscovered.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Few witness the sinking of a ship and live to tell the tale, but after 10 years under the sea, a former weapon of war is now waiting to be rediscovered.
